metadata.synopsis: |Player manually attacked the githyanki, bypassing the normal flow. Lae'zel is still a NPC. She sides with the githyanki in this combat.|

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: I should have ended you when I had the chance.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: She was never a companion

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: Shka'keth! I will tolerate you no longer.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: She was in the player's party, but they decided to manually attack the gith before triggering the confrontation dialog, so she sides with the gith
